name: The Old Place of Fun 3. (Official page.)
name_original: The Old Place of Fun 3. (Official page.)
description:
Welcome to "The Place of Fun the horror attraction". Where you can see the past of the place of fun. To let you know, this is only 18+ to enter the attraction, and explore the mysterious haunted place people say. Grab your flashlight and explore whenever you want. Don't worry they won't bite, just don't be near them and you will be safe and sound.

  • Main character.

    You play as a father by the name of Michael Daniels. Your job is to expose the truth of The place of fun.

  • Models made by.
    FelineAnimations, Guy3212.

MINIMUM:
OS: Windows XP,Vista,Windows 7,Windows 8 or 8.1, and Windows 10.
Processor: Intel Pentium 4 or AMD Athlon.
Memory: 1 GB RAM.
Graphics: 1 GB.
DirectX: Version 9.0.
Storage: ??? MB available space.
